channel.title: Short ban
channel.description: Hey, Just wondering, Would it be possible to make say a folder called ban, and when a mod or someone says ::shortban or something, It would send a java file/.txt to the folder called ban with the name of the banned user and the time they got unbanned? When the time came it would automatically delete the file? Im just curious xD

item.title: Short ban
item.dc:creator: @Jozo4213 Jozo4213
item.description:
@Jozo4213 wrote:

Well im a noob with Java so i wouldn’t really know what to do heh

Read full topic

item.title: Short ban
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Actually, yes, it would make more since to write a file for every character. Then set it a time limit. Just import time into client.java, then when you use the command have it read the time, and on the log in have it check if theres a file with that name. If there is it’ll check it for the time. If it’s past when it was when they were banned, it allows them, otherwise it sends the ban message.

Read full topic

item.title: Short ban
item.dc:creator: @Jozo4213 Jozo4213
item.description:
@Jozo4213 wrote:

Ah well im used to things what if they ban, it creates multiple files. But… Hmm… Does anyone know any type of code for it, or anything? Or any servers with it on?

Read full topic

item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

It wouldn’t make a text file for each person you could make it write everyone to one text file.
